label: Descriptive List of Free Negroes Belonging to City Engine No. 6 [Copy 1]
description: List of volunteer firefighters of city engine number 6, including their names, ages, description, occupation, and residence. Donated to the Charleston Museum by Charles Pequette, 1925

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: List of volunteer firefighters of city engine number 6, including their names, ages, description, occupation, and residence. Donated to the Charleston Museum by Charles Pequette, 1925

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: Descriptive List of Free Negroes Belonging to City Engine No. 6            No. Date of Enrollment Names Age Height Eyes Hair Complexion Occupation Residence Remarks    Anderson, J.W. 20 5 ft Gray Brown Brown Painter Amherst St.     Bennett, S.L. 45 5-9 Hasell Black Brunett Boot Maker Wall St     Barnett, H.E. 30 5-6 Gray Light Light Carpenter Green St.     Bell, H. L. 30 5-6 Dark Black Brown Painter Green St.     Barnett, Wm. E. 28 5-4 Light Light Light Porter Green St.     Bowers, F.C. 28 5-6 Dark Light Brown Porter Cuming [Coming] St.     Bearde, E.P. 26 5-5 Dark Dark Brown Tailor Cuming [Coming] St.     Clarke, J.E. 49 5-10 Dark Dark Brown Packer Cuming [Coming] St.     Crocker, E.G. 46 5-8 Dark Dark Brown Boot Maker St. Phillip St.     Collins, J. 35 5-8 Dark Dark Brown Butcher Mill St.     Decosta, J.B. 29 5-5 Dark Dark Light Boot Maker Cuming [Coming] St.     Dupree, T. 30 5-4 Dark Dark Fair Mill Right Burns Lane     Elfe, W. S. 28 5-7 Dark Dark Brown Carpenter Collage [College] St.     Fields, Wm. 35 5-8 Dark Dark Brown Carpenter Cuming [Coming] St.     Fordham, E.W. 32 5-6 Light Light Fair Farmer Chapel St.    Ferrett, E.S. 30 5-3 Black Black Brown Carpenter Queen St.    Glover, Geo. A. 45 5-4 Black Black Brown Saddler Collage [College] St.    Garden, A. 26 5-5 Black Black Brown Butcher Cuming [Coming] St.    Garden, E. 24 5-6 Black Black Brown Butcher Henrietta St.    Hart, R.D. 37 5-6 Black Black Brown Porter Rumney [Romney] St.    Hare, Stephen 35 5-6 Black Black Fair Tailor Wenthworth [Wentworth] St.    Hampton, E.P. 32 5-5 Light Light Brown Barber Elizabeth St.    Holloway, M.H. 25 5-5 Black Black Brown Carter Beaufain St.    Holloway, S.D. 42 5-6 Black Black Brown Carter Calhoun St.    Johnson, S.W. 35 5-6 Black Black Brown Carpenter Smith St.    Kruger, F.C. 25 5-7 Light Light Light Tobacconist Cuming [Coming] St.    Lessesne, Thos. 37 5-7 Light Light Brown Porter Smith St.    Levy, Edwin 45 5-9 Light Light Light Carpenter St. Phillip St.    Lopez, Francis 40 5-4 Dark Dark Brown Fisherman Henrietta St.    Marshall, Wm. E. 38 5-3 Dark Black Brown Barber Cuming [Coming] St.    Myers, G. 49 5-7 Dark Black Brown Tailor Elizabeth St.     Mushington, J.A. 22 5-10 Grey Light Light Taylor Meeting St.     Magrath, G. 23 5-6 Light Light Light Carpenter St. Phillip St.     McKinlay, Wm. A. 28 5-6 Dark Dark Brown Tailor Cuming [Coming] St.     McKinlay, G.J. 26 5-8 Dark Black Brown Saddler Cuming [Coming] St.     McKinlay, A. 24 5-5 Dark Black Brown Saddler Cuming [Coming] St.     Prealeau, J. 38 5-10 Dark Black Brown Butcher John St.     Pircell, Jacob 40 5-4 Dark Black Brown Tanner Elizabeth St.     Ryan, Daniel 28 5-8 Dark Black Brown Butcher Wall St     Ryan, Frances 26 5-4 Dark Brown Brown Tobacconist Wall St     Sousportas, F.W. 28 5-8 Dark Black Brown Butcher Mill St.     Shrewsbury, Geo. 28 5-8 Dark Black Brown Butcher Judith St.     Shrewsbury, Hnry. 24 5-4 Dark Black Brown Butcher Judith St. include this name    Turner, Nath'l. 24 5-7 Dark Black Brown Tailor Collage [College] St.     Thom, Phillip 26 5-5 Dark Black Brown Tobacconist Henrietta St.     Montgomery, N. 22 5-6 Light Light Light Barber Montague [Montagu] St.     The last name was accidentally left out
